document.masterDocTitle: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

Remarks.
Demirsoy ( 1973
and 1977 ) cited it from Akşehir (Saray Dağı), out from the distribution area of this species; further confirmation should be useful.
